data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in North, Singapore, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North, Singapore
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in North, Singapore to the gospel today.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in North, Singapore.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, may the churches in North, Singapore honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of North who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in North, Singapore a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in North with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 39,719 believers in the state of North with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
